import React from "react"; import ActionsList from "../components/actions/ActionsList"; const Home = () => { const handleFindActions = () => { // Rolar para a seção de ações const actionsSection = document.getElementById("actions-section"); if (actionsSection) { actionsSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } }; const handleVolunteerSignup = () => { // Abrir modal de login na aba de cadastro como voluntário window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent("openLoginModal", { detail: { activeTab: "register", userType: "volunteer", }, }) ); }; const handleONGSignup = () => { // Abrir modal de login na aba de cadastro como ONG window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent("openLoginModal", { detail: { activeTab: "register", userType: "ong", }, }) ); }; return (
